entity.name: address
entity.query: SELECT t_id::text AS id, egid::text, gemeindename, strassenname || ' ' || hausnummer || ', ' || plz::text || ' ' || ortschaft AS full_address FROM agi_mopublic_pub.mopublic_gebaeudeadresse AS adr LEFT JOIN agi_mopublic_pub.mopublic_gemeindegrenze AS gem ON ST_Intersects(adr.lage, gem.geometrie);
